CustomField.description: Counts all contacts that have Appointment Occurred checked using Object Rollup. https://amg.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Object_Rollup__c/a6I4w000000mcDNEAY/view
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shown Appointment is when the Appointment Status on contact is: Discovery-Still Working,Proposal Delivered,Verbal Commitment,Nurture-No Interest,Nurture-Prospect Not Responding,Nurture-Timing/Delayed,Nurture-Proposal Not Signed,Won - Closed Business,No Longer Pursuing ( Excludes: First Meeting Scheduled and Need to Reschedule-Meeting did not take place )
CustomField.label: Shown Appointments
